Canchanchara.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Canchanchara.prep: mix honey with water and lime juice and spread the mixture on the bottom and sides of the glass. add cracked ice, and then the rum. end by energetically stirring from bottom to top.

Moscow mule.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Moscow mule.prep: combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. add lime juice. stir gently. garnish.

Illegal.served:
served in one of two ways:
straight up (no ice) in a chilled cocktail glass
on the rocks (over ice) in a traditional clay or terracotta mug
Illegal.prep: pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. shake vigorously. strain into chilled cocktail glass, or "on the rocks" into a traditional clay or terracotta mug.

Rusty Nail.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Rusty Nail.prep: pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. stir gently. garnish with a lemon twist. serve.

Mary Pickford.prep: shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

Dry martini.prep: straight: pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. stir well. strain into chilled martini cocktail glass. squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

Paradise.prep: shake together over ice.  strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

Singapore Sling.prep: pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. shake well. strain into highball glass. garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.

Daiquiri.prep: in a cocktail shaker add all ingredients. stir well to dissolve the sugar. add ice and shake. strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Sex on the Beach.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Sex on the Beach.prep: build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. garnish with orange slice.

Ve.n.to.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Ve.n.to.prep: pour all ingredients into the shaker. shake vigorously with ice. strain into a chilled small tumbler glass filled with ice.

Mai Tai.prep: shake all ingredients with ice. pour unstrained into glass. garnish and serve with straw.

Tequila Sunrise.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Tequila Sunrise.prep: pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice.  add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom.  stir gently to create the sunrise effect.  garnish and serve.

Aviation.prep: add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. shake well and strain into cocktail glass. garnish with a cherry.

Stinger.prep: pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass.  may also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

White Lady.prep: add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

Clover Club.prep: dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

Long Island iced tea.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Long Island iced tea.prep: add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. stir gently. optionally garnish with lemon slice.

Black Russian.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Black Russian.prep: pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. stir gently.

Hanky Panky.prep: stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

Trinidad Sour.prep: pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Tuxedo.prep: stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.  garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

Old fashioned.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Old fashioned.garnish: orange slice or zest, and cocktail cherry
Old fashioned.prep: place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a few dashes of plain water. muddle until dissolved. fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. garnish with orange slice or zest, and a cocktail cherry.

Pisco Sour.prep: vigorously shake contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then strain into a glass and garnish with bitters.

Sidecar.prep: pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

Grasshopper.prep: pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Sazerac.prep: rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. add the lemon peel for garnish.

Paloma.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Paloma.prep: pour tequila into highball glass. squeeze lime juice. add ice and salt, then top with soda and stir gently.

Irish coffee.prep: heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. pour into glass and top with cream; serve hot.

Cuba libre.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Cuba libre.prep: build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. garnish with lime wedge.

Bramble.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Bramble.prep: fill glass with crushed ice. build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

Naked and Famous.prep: pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. shake well. strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Barracuda.prep: shake pour ingredients with ice. strain into glass, top with sparkling wine.

Corpse Reviver #2.prep: stir with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Lemon drop martini.prep: pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass. garnish with sugar rim around the glass.

Dark 'n' Stormy.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Dark 'n' Stormy.prep: fill glass with ice, add ginger beer and top with rum. garnish with lime wedge.

Fernandito.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Fernandito.prep: fill a double old-fashioned glass with ice. pour in the fernet-branca, fill the glass with cola. stir gently.

Porto flip.prep: shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice.  strain into glass, garnish and serve

Brandy Crusta.prep: mix all ingredients with ice cubes in a mixing glass.  strain into slim cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

Champagne cocktail.prep: add dash of angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. add cognac followed by gently pouring chilled champagne. garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

Americano.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Americano.garnish: half an orange slice, lemon twist
Americano.prep: pour the campari and vermouth over ice into a highball glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice and a lemon twist.

Vieux Carr\u00e9.prep: pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. stir well. strain into chilled cocktail glass. garnish with orange zest and a maraschino cherry.

Penicillin.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Penicillin.prep: muddle fresh ginger in a shaker and add the remaining ingredients, except for the lagavulin whiskey. fill the shaker with ice and shake. double-strain into a chilled old fashioned glass with ice. float the lagavulin whiskey on top.

Tommy's margarita.prep: shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Mint julep.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Mint julep.prep: in a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. fill the glass with cracked ice, add bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. garnish with a mint sprig.

Tipperary.prep: pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. stir well. strain into chilled cocktail glass. garnish with a slice of orange.

Old Cuban.prep: pour all ingredients except the wine into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled elegant cocktail glass. top up with the sparkling wine and garnish with mint sprigs

Negroni.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Negroni.prep: stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

Bellini.prep: pour peach purée into chilled glass, add sparkling wine. stir gently.

Between the Sheets.prep: pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Yellow Bird.prep: pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass

Mimosa.prep: ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. serve cold.

Horse's Neck.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Horse's Neck.prep: pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. stir gently. garnish with lemon zest. if desired, add dashes of angostura bitter.

Southside.prep: shake well with ice and double-strain into a chilled cocktail glass

Boulevardier.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Boulevardier.prep: stir with ice, strain, garnish and serve.

Alexander.prep: shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

French 75.prep: combine gin, syrup, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.  shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass.  top up with champagne. stir gently.

John Collins.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
John Collins.prep: pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. stir gently. garnish. add a dash of angostura bitters.

Casino.prep: pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. shake well. strain into chilled cocktail glass. garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. serve without a straw.

Bee's Knees.garnish: optionally garnish with lemon or orange zest
Bee's Knees.prep: stir honey syrup with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. strain into chilled cocktail glass

Paper Plane.prep: pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Planter's Punch.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Planter's Punch.prep: pour all ingredients into a tumbler glass.

Last Word.prep: shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Martinez.prep: stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

Whiskey sour.served: on the rocks or straight up
Whiskey sour.garnish: maraschino cherry and half orange slice
Whiskey sour.prep: shake with ice. strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

Mojito.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Mojito.garnish: sprig of mint (yerba buena in the original recipe), slice of lime
Mojito.prep: muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. pour the rum and top with soda water. garnish with sprig of mint leaves and lemon slice. serve with straw.

Zombie.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Zombie.prep: mix ingredients in a shaker with crushed ice. pour into a tall tumbler glass.

Caipirinha.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Caipirinha.prep: place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). fill the glass with ice and add the cachaça.

Margarita.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Margarita.prep: pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. shake well and strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt.

Pi\u00f1a Colada.prep: blend all the ingredients with ice in an electric blender, pour into a large goblet or hurricane glass and serve.

Monkey Gland.prep: shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Manhattan.prep: stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

Cosmopolitan.prep: shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice. strain into a large cocktail glass. garnish with lime slice.

Kir.prep: add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.

Golden dream.prep: shake with cracked ice.  strain into glass and serve.

Bloody Mary.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Bloody Mary.prep: stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. garnish.

New York Sour.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
New York Sour.garnish: lemon or orange zest and cherry
New York Sour.prep: pour the whiskey, syrup, lemon juice, and egg white into shaker with ice cubes. shake vigorously. strain into chilled rocks glass filled with ice. float the wine on top. garnish with lemon or orange zest and cherry.

Spritz.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Spritz.prep: build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice. stir gently.

Espresso martini.prep: pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass.

Hemingway Special.prep: pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. shake.

Sea Breeze.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Sea Breeze.prep: build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. garnish with lime wedge.

French martini.prep: pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

French Connection.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
French Connection.prep: pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. stir gently.

Russian Spring Punch.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Russian Spring Punch.prep: pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the sparkling wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled tall tumbler glass filled with ice and top up with sparkling wine.

Angel Face.prep: pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Vesper.prep: shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. add the garnish.

Suffering Bastard.served: on the rocks; poured over ice
Suffering Bastard.prep: shake everything but ginger beer with ice, pour unstrained into glass, top with ginger beer.
